message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value of similar products, but I'm afraid I can't quite meet you at $850000. However, I'm willing to compromise and offer you a deal at $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the unique features and benefits of this product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price at $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not ready to accept $875000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you a deal at $880000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
